column3: second son of [[Fëanor]]. In the [[The Etymologies]] it is translated as "Gold-cleaver"
column4: <ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}</ref> while [[The Shibboleth of Feanor]] explains that the name might be connected to his skill in harping
column6: ''The names of the Sons of Fëanor with the legend of the fate of Amrod''
